column1: Specifications: "Two-way audio module that connects to an AI Theta Hub."
Features: "Built-in microphone and speaker for two-way audio
Connects to an AI Theta Hub with the included cable
Includes flush mount for flat ceiling or wall mounting"
"Weight": "UVC-AI-Theta-Audio: 65 g (2.3 oz) UVC-AI-Theta-Audio Flush Mount: 22 g (0.8 oz)"
"Cable jacket enclosure dimensions": "28 x 13 x 7.5 mm (1.1 x 0.5 x 0.3\")"
"Ambient operating temperature": "-20 to 40° C (-4 to 104° F)"
